mutants.code:
import re

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', sentence)
    return sentence != sentence[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence = re.sub('', '', sentence)
    return sentence == sentence[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence = re.sub('[^a-z]', 'MUTATED', sentence)
    return sentence == sentence[::-1]

import re

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', sentence)
    return sentence == sentence[::+1]

    return sentence == sentence[::-2]

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()

import re

def check_palindrome(sentence):
    sentence = sentence.lower()
    sentence = re.sub('[^a-z]', '', sentence)
    return sentence == sentence[::--1]
